# Pedrof

**Target Role:** Controls / Embedded Systems Engineer — Powersports, Robotics

**Education:** B.S. Computer Engineering — University of South Carolina

## Summary
Senior CE focused on embedded control systems and practical ML.
Built IoT search-and-rescue prototypes and automated workflows for a fire department.
I like turning rough ideas into reliable, testable hardware+software.


## Strengths
Embedded C/C++ (ESP32, STM32), Python (NumPy/Pandas),
PID control & filtering, CAN bus, PCB prototyping, RF comms,
AWS IoT + CI/CD (GitHub Actions), teamwork & mentoring
